text:
FYI to anyone else with this issue, after scouring the internet and doing some trial and error, I found the v1 deals getAll endpoint accepts the following which solves my problem. It looks like something that was added for a Stitch integration as far as I can see, and there is very little documentation or resources for this, but it certainly works:
```&allPropertiesFetchMode=all_versions&includeAllProperties=true```
